Package br.octahedron.util.reflect

Interface Summary
AnnotatedMethodListener<T extends Annotation> This listener gets notified when the getAnnotatedMethods(Class, Class, AnnotatedMethodListener) finds a method that matches the method search criteria.
 

Class Summary
AnnotatedClassesLoader Loads Annotated Classes.
AnnotatedMethod<T extends Annotation> A simple data structure to encapsulate a annotated method.
InstanceHandler<T> An instance handler for instances of a type.
ReflectionUtil This class provides reflection utilities methods.
 

Exception Summary
InstanceLoadException Thrown to indicate that a filter was unable to be loaded.
